name: qr-code-generator-extension
description: Chrome extension for generating QR codes with embedded images

scripts.dev: echo 'Run npm run build first, then load unpacked extension from chrome://extensions/ using the build/ folder'
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run download-deps && npm run compile && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: cp manifest.json build/ && cp index.html build/ && cp background.js build/ && cp -r vendor build/ && npm run create-icons
